package.name: Comet.

dependencies.package: mobilesubstrate, libactivator, com.muirey03.libimagepicker, applist, ws.hbang.alderis, ws.hbang.common (>= 1.14)

package.shortDescription: System wide widgets based on iOS14.

descriptionlist.description: Comet adds widgets that can be invoked using activator gestures anywhere in the system: on the lock screen, on the home screen, in applications. This is the main difference between Comet and other tweaks that statically render widgets on the home screen. Thanks to the scroll option, you can select and view all possible widgets. You don't have to rack your brains when choosing which widget you want to display. At the moment there are 14 widgets.
